def_cn: (因为平局或有争议而进行的)复赛，再赛，重赛
def_en: A rematch is a second game that is played between two people or teams, for example because their first match was a draw or because there was a dispute about some aspect of it.

def_cn: (比赛或竞赛对手之间的)复赛，二次交手
def_en: A rematch is a second game or contest between two people or teams who have already faced each other.
